respStmt.name: EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis

change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by Lowell Bowditch
Replaced LYRIC Meter= tag with SPEECH Meter=

$Log: aristoph.frogs_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.4 2013-06-13 12:41:19 gcrane tagging now should be compatible with CTS

Revision 1.2 2011-01-13 03:38:23 gcrane more refinements making these files SDL compatible

e)n toi=sin u(sta/tois fra/sw, tou=ton de\ prw=t' e)le/gcw,
w(s h)=n a)lazw\n kai\ fe/nac oi(/ois te tou\s qeata\s
prw/tista me\n ga\r e(/na tin' a)\n kaqi=sen e)gkalu/yas,
*)axille/a tin' h)\ *nio/bhn, to\ pro/swpon ou)xi\ deiknu/s,
pro/sxhma th=s tragw|di/as, gru/zontas ou)de\ touti/.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: o( de\ xoro/s g' h)/reiden o(rmaqou\s a)\n
melw=n e)fech=s te/ttaras cunexw=s a)/n oi( d' e)si/gwn.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: e)gw\ d' e)/xairon th=| siwph=|, kai/ me tou=t' e)/terpen
ou)x h(=tton h)\ nu=n oi( lalou=ntes.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: ka)mautw=| dokw=. ti/ de\ tau=t' e)/dras' o( dei=na;

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: u(p' a)lazonei/as, i(/n' o( qeath\s prosdokw=n kaqoi=to,
o(po/q' h( *nio/bh ti fqe/gcetai: to\ dra=ma d' a)\n dih/|ei.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: w)\ pampo/nhros, oi(=' a)/r' e)fenakizo/mhn u(p' au)tou=.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: ka)/peit' e)peidh\ tau=ta lhrh/seie kai\ to\ dra=ma
h)/dh mesoi/h, r(h/mat' a)\n bo/eia dw/dek' ei)=pen,
o)fru=s e)/xonta kai\ lo/fous, dei/n' a)/tta mormorwpa/,

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: safe\s d' a)\n ei)=pen ou)de\ e(/n—

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: a)ll' h)\ *skama/ndrous h)\ ta/frous h)\ 'p' a)spi/dwn e)po/ntas

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: h)/dh pot' e)n makrw=| xro/nw| nukto\s dihgru/pnhsa
to\n couqo\n i(ppalektruo/na zhtw=n ti/s e)stin o)/rnis.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: shmei=on e)n tai=s nausi\n w)=maqe/stat' e)nege/grapto.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: e)gw\ de\ to\n *filoce/nou g' w)/|mhn *)/erucin ei)=nai.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: ei)=t' e)n tragw|di/ais e)xrh=n ka)lektruo/na poih=sai;

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: su\ d' w)= qeoi=sin e)xqre\ poi=' a)/tt' e)sti\n a(/tt' e)poi/eis;

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: ou)x i(ppalektruo/nas ma\ *di/' ou)de\ tragela/fous, a(/per su/,
a)ll' w(s pare/labon th\n te/xnhn para\ sou= to\ prw=ton eu)qu\s
oi)dou=san u(po\ kompasma/twn kai\ r(hma/twn e)paxqw=n,
i)/sxnana me\n prw/tiston au)th\n kai\ to\ ba/ros a)fei=lon
e)pulli/ois kai\ peripa/tois kai\ teutli/oisi leukoi=s,
xulo\n didou\s stwmulma/twn a)po\ bibli/wn a)phqw=n:

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: ei)=t' ou)k e)lh/roun o(/ ti tu/xoim' ou)d' e)mpesw\n e)/furon,
a)ll' ou(ciw\n prw/tista me/n moi to\ ge/nos ei)=p' a)\n eu)qu\s

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: krei=tton ga\r h)=n soi nh\ *di/' h)\ to\ sautou=.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: e)/peit' a)po\ tw=n prw/twn e)pw=n ou)de\n parh=k' a)\n a)rgo/n,
a)ll' e)/legen h( gunh/ te/ moi xw) dou=los ou)de\n h(=tton,
xw) despo/ths xh) parqe/nos xh) grau=s a)/n.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: ou)k a)poqanei=n se tau=t' e)xrh=n tolmw=nta;

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: ou) soi\ ga/r e)sti peri/patos ka/llista peri/ ge tou/tou.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: w(s pri\n dida/cai g' w)/feles me/sos diarragh=nai.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: leptw=n te kano/nwn e)sbola\s e)pw=n te gwniasmou/s,
noei=n o(ra=n cunie/nai stre/fein e)ra=n texna/zein,

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: oi)kei=a pra/gmat' ei)sa/gwn, oi(=s xrw/meq', oi(=s cu/nesmen,
e)c w(=n g' a)\n e)chlegxo/mhn: cuneido/tes ga\r ou(=toi
h)/legxon a)/n mou th\n te/xnhn: a)ll' ou)k e)kompola/koun
a)po\ tou= fronei=n a)pospa/sas, ou)d' e)ce/plhtton au)tou/s,
gnw/sei de\ tou\s tou/tou te ka)mou\s e(kate/rou maqhta/s.
ou(moi\ de\ *kleitofw=n te kai\ *qhrame/nhs o( komyo/s.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: *qhrame/nhs; sofo/s g' a)nh\r kai\ deino\s e)s ta\ pa/nta,
o(\s h)\n kakoi=s pou peripe/sh| kai\ plhsi/on parasth=|,
pe/ptwken e)/cw tw=n kakw=n, ou) *xi=os a)lla\ *kei=os.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: ta/ t' a)/lla kai\ ta\s oi)ki/as
pou= moi todi/; ti/s tou=t' e)/labe;’

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: su\ de\ ti/ fe/re pro\s tau=ta le/ceis;

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: a)ll' w)= prw=tos tw=n *(ellh/nwn purgw/sas r(h/mata semna\

kai\ kosmh/sas tragiko
 lh=ron, qarrw=n to
 krouno
 a)fi/ei.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: qumou=mai me\n th=| cuntuxi/a|, kai\ mou ta\ spla/gxn' a)ganaktei=,
ei) pro\s tou=ton dei= m' a)ntile/gein: i(/na mh\ fa/skh| d' a)porei=n me,
a)po/krinai/ moi, ti/nos ou(/neka xrh\ qauma/zein a)/ndra poihth/n;

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: decio/thtos kai\ nouqesi/as, o(/ti belti/ous te poiou=men

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: a)ll' e)k xrhstw=n kai\ gennai/wn moxqhrota/tous a)pe/deicas,

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: ske/yai toi/nun oi(/ous au)tou\s par' e)mou= parede/cato prw=ton,
ei) gennai/ous kai\ tetraph/xeis, kai\ mh\ diadrasipoli/tas,
mhd' a)gorai/ous mhde\ koba/lous w(/sper nu=n mhde\ panou/rgous,
a)lla\ pne/ontas do/ru kai\ lo/gxas kai\ leukolo/fous trufalei/as
kai\ ph/lhkas kai\ knhmi=das kai\ qumou\s e(ptaboei/ous.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: kai\ dh\ xwrei= touti\ to\ kako/n: kranopoiw=n au)= m' e)pitri/yei.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: kai\ ti/ su\ dra/sas ou(/tws au)tou\s gennai/ous e)cedi/dacas;

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: o(\ qeasa/menos pa=s a)/n tis a)nh\r h)ra/sqh da/ios ei)=nai.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: touti\ me/n soi kako\n ei)/rgastai: *qhbai/ous ga\r pepoi/hkas
a)ndreiote/rous e)s to\n po/lemon, kai\ tou/tou g' ou(/neka tu/ptou.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: a)ll' u(mi=n au)/t' e)ch=n a)skei=n, a)ll' ou)k e)pi\ tou=t' e)tra/pesqe.
ei)=ta dida/cas *pe/rsas meta\ tou=t' e)piqumei=n e)cedi/daca
nika=n a)ei\ tou\s a)ntipa/lous, kosmh/sas e)/rgon a)/riston.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: o( xoro\s d' eu)qu\s tw\ xei=r' w(di\ sugkrou/sas ei)=pen i)auoi=.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: tau=ta ga\r a)/ndras xrh\ poihta\s a)skei=n. ske/yai ga\r a)p' a)rxh=s
w(s w)fe/limoi tw=n poihtw=n oi( gennai=oi gege/nhntai.
*)orfeu\s me\n ga\r teleta/s q' h(mi=n kate/deice fo/nwn t' a)pe/xesqai,
*mousai=os d' e)cake/seis te no/swn kai\ xrhsmou/s, *(hsi/odos de\
gh=s e)rgasi/as, karpw=n w(/ras, a)ro/tous: o( de\ qei=os *(/omhros
a)po\ tou= timh\n kai\ kle/os e)/sxen plh\n tou=d' o(/ti xrh/st' e)di/dacen,

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: e)di/dacen o(/mws to\n skaio/taton: prw/hn gou=n, h(ni/k' e)/pempen,
to\ kra/nos prw=ton peridhsa/menos to\n lo/fon h)/mell' e)pidh/sein.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: a)ll' a)/llous toi pollou\s a)gaqou/s, w(=n h)=n kai\ *la/maxos h(/rws:
o(/qen h(mh\ frh\n a)pomacame/nh polla\s a)reta\s e)poi/hsen,
a)ntektei/nein au(to\n tou/tois, o(po/tan sa/lpiggos a)kou/sh|.
a)ll' ou) ma\ *di/' ou) *fai/dras e)poi/oun po/rnas ou)de\ *sqeneboi/as,
ou)d' oi)=d' ou)dei\s h(/ntin' e)rw=san pw/pot' e)poi/hsa gunai=ka.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: ma\ *di/' ou) ga\r e)ph=n th=s *)afrodi/ths ou)de/n soi.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: a)ll' e)pi/ toi soi\ kai\ toi=s soi=sin pollh\ pollou= 'pikaqh=to,
w(/ste ge kau)to/n se kat' ou)=n e)/balen.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: nh\ to\n *di/a tou=to/ ge/ toi dh/.
a(\ ga\r e)s ta\s a)llotri/as e)poi/eis, au)to\s tou/toisin e)plh/ghs.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: kai\ ti/ bla/ptous' w)= sxe/tli' a)ndrw=n th\n po/lin a(mai\ *sqene/boiai;

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: o(/ti gennai/as kai\ gennai/wn a)ndrw=n a)lo/xous a)ne/peisas
kw/neia piei=n ai)sxunqei/sas dia\ tou\s sou\s *bellerofo/ntas.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: po/teron d' ou)k o)/nta lo/gon tou=ton peri\ th=s *fai/dras cune/qhka;

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: ma\ *di/' a)ll' o)/nt': a)ll' a)pokru/ptein xrh\ to\ ponhro\n to/n ge poihth/n,
kai\ mh\ para/gein mhde\ dida/skein. toi=s me\n ga\r paidari/oisin
e)/sti dida/skalos o(/stis fra/zei, toi=sin d' h(bw=si poihtai/.
pa/nu dh\ dei= xrhsta\ le/gein h(ma=s.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: kai\ *parnassw=n h(mi=n mege/qh, tou=t' e)sti\ to\ xrhsta\ dida/skein,

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: mega/lwn gnwmw=n kai\ dianoiw=n i)/sa kai\ ta\ r(h/mata ti/ktein.
ka)/llws ei)ko\s tou\s h(miqe/ous toi=s r(h/masi mei/zosi xrh=sqai:
kai\ ga\r toi=s i(mati/ois h(mw=n xrw=ntai polu\ semnote/roisin.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: prw=ton me\n tou\s basileu/ontas r(a/ki' a)mpisxw/n, i(/n' e)leinoi\

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: ou)/koun e)qe/lei ge trihrarxei=n ploutw=n ou)dei\s dia\ tau=ta,
a)lla\ r(aki/ois perieila/menos kla/ei kai\ fhsi\ pe/nesqai.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: nh\ th\n *dh/mhtra xitw=na/ g' e)/xwn ou)/lwn e)ri/wn u(pe/nerqen.
ka)\n tau=ta le/gwn e)capath/sh|, para\ tou\s i)xqu=s a)ne/kuyen.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: ei)=t' au)= lalia\n e)pithdeu=sai kai\ stwmuli/an e)di/dacas,
h(\ 'ceke/nwsen ta/s te palai/stras kai\ ta\s puga\s e)ne/triyen
tw=n meiraki/wn stwmullome/nwn, kai\ tou\s *para/lous a)ne/peisen
a)ntagoreu/ein toi=s a)/rxousin. kai/toi to/te g' h(ni/k' e)gw\ 'zwn,
ou)k h)pi/stant' a)ll' h)\ ma=zan kale/sai kai\ r(uppapai= ei)pei=n.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: nh\ to\n *)apo/llw, kai\ prospardei=n g' e)s to\ sto/ma tw=| qala/maki,
kai\ minqw=sai to\n cu/ssiton ka)kba/s tina lwpoduth=sai:
nu=n d' a)ntile/gei kou)ke/t' e)lau/nwn plei= deuri\ kau)=qis e)kei=se.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: poi/wn de\ kakw=n ou)k ai)/tio/s e)st';
kai\ faskou/sas ou) zh=n to\ zh=n;
ka)=|t' e)k tou/twn h( po/lis h(mw=n
lampa/da d' ou)dei\s oi(=o/s te fe/rein

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: me/ga to\ pra=gma, polu\ to\ nei=kos, a(dro\s o( po/lemos e)/rxetai.
o( d' e)panastre/fein du/nhtai ka)perei/desqai torw=s.
e)sbolai\ ga/r ei)si pollai\ xa)/terai sofisma/twn.
o(/ ti per ou)=n e)/xeton e)ri/zein,
ta/ te palaia\ kai\ ta\ kaina/,
ka)pokinduneu/eton lepto/n ti kai\ sofo\n le/gein.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ei) de\ tou=to katafobei=sqon, mh/ tis a)maqi/a prosh=|
mhde\n o)rrwdei=te tou=q': w(s ou)ke/q' ou(/tw tau=t' e)/xei.
bibli/on t' e)/xwn e(/kastos manqa/nei ta\ decia/:
pa/nt' e)pe/citon qeatw=n g' ou(/nex' w(s o)/ntwn sofw=n.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: kai\ mh\n e)p' au)tou\s tou\s prolo/gous sou tre/yomai,
o(/pws to\ prw=ton th=s tragw|di/as me/ros
a)safh\s ga\r h)=n e)n th=| fra/sei tw=n pragma/twn.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: prw=ton de/ moi to\n e)c *)orestei/as le/ge.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: a)/ge dh\ siw/pa pa=s a)nh/r. le/g' *ai)sxu/le.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: swth\r genou= moi su/mmaxo/s t' ai)toume/nw|.
h(/kw ga\r e)s gh=n th/nde kai\ kate/rxomai.’

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: a)ll' ou)de\ pa/nta tau=ta/ g' e)/st' a)ll' h)\ tri/a.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: e)/xei d' e(/kaston ei)/kosi/n g' a(marti/as.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: *ai)sxu/le parainw= soi siwpa=n: ei) de\ mh/,

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: eu)qu\s ga\r h(ma/rthken ou)ra/nio/n g' o(/son.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: ou)/koun *)ore/sths tou=t' e)pi\ tw=| tu/mbw| le/gei

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: po/ter' ou)=n to\n *(ermh=n, w(s o( path\r a)pw/leto

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: ei) ga\r patrw=|on to\ xqo/nion e)/xei ge/ras—

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: ou(/tw g' a)\n ei)/h pro\s patro\s tumbwru/xos.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: le/g' e(/teron au)tw=|: su\ d' e)pith/rei to\ bla/bos.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: h(/kw ga\r e)s gh=n th/nde kai\ kate/rxomai—’

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: di\s tau)to\n h(mi=n ei)=pen o( sofo\s *ai)sxu/los.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: sko/pei to\ r(h=m': e)gw\ de/ soi fra/sw.
h(/kw ga\r e)s gh=n, fhsi/, kai\ kate/rxomai:
h(/kw de\ tau)to/n e)sti tw=| kate/rxomai.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: nh\ to\n *di/' w(/sper g' ei)/ tis ei)/poi gei/toni,

l.q: xrh=son su\ ma/ktran, ei) de\ bou/lei, ka/rdopon.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: ou) dh=ta tou=to/ g' w)= katestwmulme/ne
a)/nqrwpe tau)/t' e)/st', a)ll' a)/rist' e)pw=n e)/xon.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: pw=s dh/; di/dacon ga/r me kaq' o(/ ti dh\ le/geis;

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: e)lqei=n me\n e)s gh=n e)/sq' o(/tw| meth=| pa/tras:
feu/gwn d' a)nh\r h(/kei te kai\ kate/rxetai.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: eu)= nh\ to\n *)apo/llw. ti/ su\ le/geis *eu)ripi/dh;

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: la/qra| ga\r h)=lqen ou) piqw\n tou\s kuri/ous.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: eu)= nh\ to\n *(ermh=n: o(/ ti le/geis d' ou) manqa/nw.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: *ai)sxu/l' a)nu/sas: su\ d' e)s to\ kako\n a)po/blepe.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: ‘tu/mbou d' e)p' o)/xqw| tw=|de khru/ssw patri\

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: teqnhko/sin ga\r e)/legen w)= mo/xqhre su/,

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: su\ de\ pw=s e)poi/eis tou\s prolo/gous;

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: ka)/n pou di\s ei)/pw tau)to/n, h)\ stoibh\n i)/dh|s

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: i)/qi dh\ le/g': ou) ga/r mou)/stin a)ll' a)kouste/a
tw=n sw=n prolo/gwn th=s o)rqo/thtos tw=n e)pw=n.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: ma\ to\n *di/' ou) dh=t', a)lla\ kakodai/mwn fu/sei,
o(/ntina/ ge pri\n fu=nai me\n *(apo/llwn e)/fh
a)poktenei=n to\n pate/ra, pri\n kai\ gegone/nai:
pw=s ou(=tos h)=n to\ prw=ton eu)dai/mwn a)nh/r;

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: ma\ to\n *di/' ou) dh=t', ou) me\n ou)=n e)pau/sato.
pw=s ga/r; o(/te dh\ prw=ton me\n au)to\n geno/menon
i(/na mh\ 'ktrafei\s ge/noito tou= patro\s foneu/s:
ei)=q' w(s *po/lubon h)/rrhsen oi)dw=n tw\ po/de:
e)/peita grau=n e)/ghmen au)to\s w)\n ne/os
kai\ pro/s ge tou/tois th\n e(autou= mhte/ra:

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: lhrei=s: e)gw\ de\ tou\s prolo/gous kalou\s poiw=.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: kai\ mh\n ma\ to\n *di/' ou) kat' e)/pos ge/ sou kni/sw
to\ r(h=m' e(/kaston, a)lla\ su\n toi=sin qeoi=s
a)po\ lhkuqi/ou sou tou\s prolo/gous diafqerw=.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.l: poiei=s ga\r ou(/tws w(/st' e)narmo/ttein a(/pan,
kai\ kw|da/rion kai\ lhku/qion kai\ qu/lakon,
e)n toi=s i)ambei/oisi. dei/cw d' au)ti/ka.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: touti\ ti/ h)=n to\ lhku/qion; ou) klau/setai;
le/g' e(/teron au)tw=| pro/logon, i(/na kai\ gnw= pa/lin.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: oi)/moi peplh/gmeq' au)=qis u(po\ th=s lhku/qou.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.l: a)ll' ou)de\n e)/stai pra=gma: pro\s ga\r toutoni\
